### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customer_interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    conversation_text TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customer_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Email' WHERE interaction_id = '83c5f8f6-339a-4d4b-aa11-972e7f8cf147';
